column4: whenever i wish to mount a partition of my external hdd it says "acc to mtab, dev/sdb2 is already mounted on /media/disk"  but on giving sudo umount /media/disk it says not found
yeah sometimes a drive gets listed on the "Places" menu and is kind of mounted but not (: ( i think)
i think a restart will do...but i cannot do it right now due to a dwnld in progress  ..any other method
force unmount the device rather than the place it's mounted to
